analysis.selectType:
Select the transaction type you wish to query for this currency:

⚡ Real-time Dealer Monitoring: Stay updated on dealers' current activities, suitable for minute & hourly ultra-short-term trading  
📊 Intraday Dealer Dynamics: Analyze dealers' daily behavior to guide day trading  
📈 Long-term Dealer Monitoring: Track long-term dealer capital movements, ideal for weekly & monthly trading

analysis.description:
@{botName} utilizes AI deep learning and on-chain data analysis to dissect the behaviors of major cryptocurrency whales, providing you with timely and comprehensive insights into their activities.

👇 Select the type of cryptocurrency you wish to inquire about:
command.start.description: Gather global mainstream exchanges and chain data, understand Whale behavior in one second
analysis.tradeAnalysisDescription:
Select the currency you wish to inquire about:  
If no data is returned within 15 seconds, it may be that the currency is not listed or the Whale is not present. Please try another currency or try again later.
